overview: Everyone wants a taste of the good life... In particular, Duchess lusts for a better life for her daughter and herself, and she has her eye on the prize - a jeweler and his private collection. But, so do the circle of thieves around her - the two-timing private pilot, the tattooed girlfriend, the grifter and the ex-con all want a piece of something Flawless.
tagline: You'll do anything when you want the best for your daughter...
title: Flawless
